name: Inter-State Aviation
about: Interstate Aviation Inc., based in Connecticut, offers comprehensive flight training programs at Robertson Airport (4B8) in Plainville and Waterbury-Oxford Airport (OXC) in Oxford. Our professional instructors provide personalized training for various certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor. We maintain a fleet of well-maintained aircraft, including Cessna 172s, Piper Warriors, Piper Archers, a Cirrus SR-20, and Robinson R44 helicopters. Our FAA-licensed mechanics ensure all aircraft are in excellent condition. With an inviting atmosphere and friendly staff, we are open for instruction seven days a week, all year round, to help you fulfill your aviation dreams. Contact us for more information and current pricing.
